description: Mixers mix things. This means you can /b/automate any shapeless recipe/b/, along with some new fluid related recipes.
Make a basin to hold the materials for mixing.
This will allow you to make /6/twice as much andesite alloy/6/ by /6/mixing/6/ the components instead of crafting.

If you want to use the /b/alternate recipe/b/ that mixes /b/directly into alloy/b/, skipping the furnace step, set /b/Andesite Alloy/b/ as the /6/recipe filter/6/. You can do this by /6/right clicking/6/ while holding an item on the /6/side of the basin/6/. This will prevent the mixer from making any recipe other then the one that outputs the item set on the filter.
